name: The Sneak and the Creak
description:
You've had a good night of looting. All that's left to do is make your exit without waking the occupants...

...but watch your step! Some floorboards are creaky, and stepping on them will create a lot of noise.

To avoid these floorboards, you must use the numbers at the top and left of the screen, which tell you how many creaky floorboards there are in each row/column.



Left click an adjacent tile to walk there.

Right click any tile to mark it with an X.

If the door is locked, you'll need a key to open it.

Sneakers allow you to walk over creaky tiles for a limited number of steps (visible in the UI).

The Sneak and the Creak was made in 4 hours for TriJam #171. Thanks for checking it out!
